DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective investigation quantify increase tear film break-up time ( TFBUT ) associate instillation single eyedrop Ocular Emulsion dry eye sufferer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Extended Tear Film Break Up Time ( TFBUT ) With Ocular Emulsion
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective investigation compare tear film break time measure two different technique .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must 18 year age old ; 2 . The subject must best correct visual acuity 0.6 LogMAR ( ~6/24 ) good eye 3 . The subject must use topical ocular drop approximately 24 hour prior enrolment/screening visit 4 . The subject must classify dry eye enrolment/screening visit accord follow criterion : Subjects ' selfassessment dry eye status ( answer least `` time '' question , `` How often eye felt dry enough want use eye drop ? `` ) ; TFBUT measure DET ≤ 5 second least one eye ; Grade 1 meibomian gland expression eye ; Evidence miss meibomian gland eye . 1 . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery either eye within past six month . 2 . History evidence serious ocular trauma either eye within past six month . 3 . Current punctal occlusion type ( e.g. , collagen plug , silicone plug ) . 4 . History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; vaccinia ; active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye . 5 . Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period . 6 . Ocular condition conjunctival infection , iritis , ocular condition may preclude safe administration either drop investigation . 7 . Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study .
